text: What are the current implementations of forward mode with ChainRules?

elements.text: What are the current implementations of forward mode with ChainRules?

text:
ForwardDiff2, though it might be tied to an old version (its on hiatus).
it was working before though.

And there is a proof of concept ForwardDiffZero in the tests/docs of ChainRulesCore.

elements.text:
ForwardDiff2, though it might be tied to an old version (its on hiatus).
it was working before though.

And there is a proof of concept ForwardDiffZero in the tests/docs of ChainRulesCore.

text:
In general we don’t have many forward mode ADs in julia.
Because ForwardDiff.jl works so well.
Other than ForwardDiff.jl
there is just ForwardDiff2 (on hiatus)
and Zygote’s forward mode (experimental, and undocumented)

In contrast there are like over half a dozen actively worked on reverse mode ADs

text: ReversePropagation.jl effectively has this (despite its name)
